properties.Observatio: The anicut is in good condition. The total length of canal is 2.5Km. Although some parts of the canal have been concreted, some parts of it have fallen in to disrepair (W=0.6m and, H=0.45m). There is still about 1.5Km to be concreted. 108 Acres of paddy

properties.Observatio: Located in atabage oya. The canal and the anicut have been completely destroyed.
